# About IamAI

IamAI was initially created by [retrofor](https://retrofor.space) owner
[HsiangNianian](https://twitter.com/@HsiangNianian) with st's AliceBotProject.Since 2023,
[Adhrit](https://twitter.com/@xadhrit) contributed tremendously to the
project.

## Team

Currently, the project is maintained by [HsiangNianian](https://twitter.com/@HsiangNianian)
and [Adhrit](https://twitter.com/@xadhrit). You can check out the full
list of contributors on
[GitHub](https://github.com/retrofor/iamai/graphs/contributors).

## Credits

IamAI is powered by these incredible open source projects:

- https://docs.alicebot.dev
- https://reactjs.org
- https://nextjs.org
- https://turbo.build
- https://huggingface.co

## Design Assets

Feel free to use the IamAI logo and other assets in your project. But please
don't modify the logo, and don't use the logo to represent your project or
product.

|    Name     |                   Description                    |           Preview            |
| :---------: | :----------------------------------------------: | :--------------------------: |
|    Icon     | Useful for favicons, app icons, link icons, etc. | ![IamAI icon](/favicon.svg) |
|    Logo     |                 Full IamAI logo                 |  ![IamAI logo](/logo.svg)   |
| Social Card |              The IamAI social card              |   ![IamAI card](/og.jpeg)   |
